#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <cstdio>
typedef long long ll;
int countsetbits(int a){
int bit=0;
while(a>0){
if(a%2!=0)
bit++;
a/=2;
}
return bit;
}
int main(){
//THEOREM: The number of odd entries in row N of Pascal's Triangle is 2 raised to the number of 1's in the binary expansion of N.
int n;
scanf("%d",&n);
;int toraise=countsetbits(n);
int res=pow(2,toraise);
int ans=n+1-res;
printf("%d",ans);
}
